General.Name: New Best Wire Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: New Best Wire Industrial Co.,Ltd provides wires and electro polishing services in Taiwan. The company offers carbon, stainless-steel wires, and alloy steel wires; drywall, chipboard/wood, self-drilling, self-tapping, set, and customized screws; fasteners, bolts, nuts, and washers; and pipes and tubes, fitting, multi tee, clean tanks, and chambers. New Best Wire Industrial Co.,Ltd was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 12-19, Lai Guan Liau, Tainan City, Taiwan, 722
